title: Mastodon Discography 2000-2014
description:
Good luck finding a better Mastodon torrent anywhere on the interwebz. That's all I'll say. Just look at this shit:

2000 - 9 Song Demo
2001 - Lifesblood EP
2002 - Remission
2002 - Live in Atlanta
2003 - March of the Fire Ants EP
2004 - Leviathan
2004 - Live in Japan
2005 - Live in Stockholm
2006 - Blood Mountain
2006 - Call of the Mastodon
2009 - Crack the Skye
2009 - Crack the Skye (instrumental)
2010 - Jonah Hex: Revenge Gets Ugly EP
2011 - Live at the Aragon
2011 - Live the Roskilde Festival
2011 - The Hunter
2013 - Live at Brixton
2014 - Once More 'Round the Sun

Can you beat that? Huh? Can you? I'd like to see you try, punk.

I'd sure like to see you try.
